nodes.text: Mykapo was a planet located in the Mykapo system that was the homeworld of Phoenix Cell's Commander Jun Sato, his nephew Mart Mattin, the latter's father, and Yosh Calfor, a private who served in the Alliance Military.
In 2 BBY, Mykapo was the location of a space battle between the Iron Squadron, Phoenix Squadron and the Galactic Empire. Some time later the Krawg pirates raided credits from Mykapo.
At some point Mykapo maintained its own military to patrol the system. One of its leaders, Idrosen Gawat, later joined Resistance High Command.
Mykapo was named after Mickey Capoferri, an executive producer of Rebels Recon and The Star Wars Show.
